description: A dashboard for the PLC exporter

panels.description: The change over time of each holding register value (non ascii). Filter out by clicking the legends in the graph.
panels.title: Change over time in holding registers

panels.description: The change over time of each input register value (non ascii). Filter out by clicking the legends in the graph.
panels.title: Change over time in input registers

panels.description: Reading from discrete input $discrete_inputs. 'Off' means the value read is 0 and 'On' meaning the value is set to 1
panels.title: $discrete_inputs

panels.description: Reading from coil $coils. 'Off' means the value read is 0 and 'On' meaning the value is set to 1
panels.title: $coils

list.description: Select the prometheus datasource from which the metrics should be fetched
list.label: Datasource
list.name: datasource

list.description: Instance filters metrics to a specific host machine
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance

list.description: List of discrete input metric names
list.label: Discrete inputs
list.name: discrete_inputs

list.description: Types of registers in latency metrics
list.label: Latency register types
list.name: _latency_register_types

list.description: List of register types available in error metrics
list.label: Error register types
list.name: _error_register_types

title: PLC Dashboard
